### 1.1

f <- function(x, mu = 3, s = 0.5){dlnorm(x, mu, s)}
integrate(f, lower=25, upper=50)

### 1.2

f <- function(x, mu = 3, s = 0.5){dlnorm(x, mu, s)}
lower <- qlnorm(0.1, meanlog = 3, sdlog = 0.5)
upper <- qlnorm(0.9, meanlog = 3, sdlog = 0.5)
integrate(f, lower, upper)
